ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer, java.lang.Comparable<User>

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable, Observer, java.lang.Comparable<User>
    Model that represents application Users. The current user is a User, and all of his/her Friends are Users too.

      • getFriends

        public FriendsList getFriends()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Get the User's FriendsList.

        WARNING: This might hit the network! It must be run asynchronously.

        Returns:
        FriendsList containing the User's Friends.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public UserProfile getProfile()
                       throws java.io.IOException

        WARNING: This might hit the network! It must be run asynchronously.

        java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException

        public TradeList getTradeList()
                       throws java.io.IOException

        TradeList: trades which the user is involved in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
